Repository Name Unauthorized: Alabama Room Archives and Special Collections, University of West Alabama
Notes:
The Alabama Room, Archives and Special Collections collects:  
Records of The University of West Alabama, as well as individuals and groups associated with the University.  
Records relating to Sumter County, Alabama, and surrounding west Alabama counties. 
Records relating to folklife in Alabama and supporting materials. 
Records relating to the education of teachers. 
Rare books relating to Alabama and the South
Source of Repository Data: Alabama Department of Archives and History
